Save this as `setup_redteam_lab.sh` and run with:

```

chmod +x setup_redteam_lab.sh
./setup_redteam_lab.sh

```


```
#!/bin/bash

# Red Team Lab Setup Script for Kali Linux (OSEP-safe)
echo "[*] Installing OSEP-safe tools..."
sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y bloodhound neo4j mono-complete mingw-w64 golang powershell wget unzip

# Download Rubeus, SharpHound, winPEAS
mkdir -p ~/redteam-tools/{rubeus,sharphound,winpeas}
cd ~/redteam-tools

echo "[*] Downloading Rubeus..."
wget -O rubeus.zip https://github.com/GhostPack/Rubeus/archive/refs/heads/master.zip
unzip rubeus.zip -d rubeus

echo "[*] Downloading SharpHound..."
wget -O sharphound.zip https://github.com/BloodHoundAD/SharpHound/archive/refs/heads/master.zip
unzip sharphound.zip -d sharphound

echo "[*] Downloading winPEAS..."
wget -O winPEAS.exe https://github.com/carlospolop/PEASS-ng/releases/latest/download/winPEASx64.exe

echo "[*] Installing Sliver on C2 VM..."
go install github.com/bishopfox/sliver/cmd/sliver@latest

echo "[*] Done. Launch 'sliver-server' and 'sliver-client' separately to run your C2."

```
